707528f-a.title: Manhattan: 1st Ave. - 18th St.
707528f-a.text:
First Ayenue, east side, north from East 18th to 19th Streets.
Shown at the latter point is a station of the 2nd Avenue ''g)' line.
The Gramercy Theatre is a local movie house. Overhead is a gas-
holder of the Consolidst ed Edison Company. TRis is one of those
located in the 20th to 22nd Street area.
Incidentally this ares was the scene of one of Ehe bloody
frays attending the Draft Riots of the Civil ar. Details of this
are to be found in Dennis Lynch's ''Boss Tweed.''
July 19, 1939
Views 1,2
P. L. Sperr
NO REPROBUCTIONS
